Computer Information Technology
ehatche@gmail.com linkedin.com/in/emily-hatch-byui
## Currently Pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Computer Information Technology with hands-on experience in programming, networking, and technical problem-solving. ### Specialized in Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C#, SQL, AWS, GitHub, Unreal Engine (C++/Shaders) ### Research interests Software engineering, network systems, cybersecurity, game development, cloud technologies. ## Education `Expected Apr. 2026` __Brigham Young University – Idaho__, Rexburg, ID - B.S. in Computer Information Technology - Certification: CompTIA Security+ - Classroom experience with Python, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, C#, SQL, AWS, GitHub ## Experience `Apr. 2025 – Sept. 2025` __Baker__, Jacob Lake Inn — Fredonia, AZ `May 2024 – Aug. 2024` __Applied Tech Intern__, Dimension Studios — London, UK - Completed technical projects involving C++ and shader coding in Unreal Engine - Demonstrated independence and resourcefulness - Collaborated effectively both online and in person `Nov. 2021 – May 2023` __Full-Time Volunteer__, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints — Ogden, UT - Worked 70-hour weeks while serving in leadership roles, including trainer for new volunteers - Became fluent in American Sign Language and taught it to others `Aug. 2021 – Nov. 2021` __Emissions Compliance Intern__, PACCAR — Bellevue, WA - Reviewed and developed certification processes aligned with EPA and CARB requirements - Studied naming structures, labeling, and serialization processes - Compiled regulatory information into presentations for Senior Management ## Projects / Skills - Hackathon Volunteer: supported logistics and event operations - Experienced with Cisco Packet Tracer and physical networking equipment - Strong communication and teamwork skills - Technical writing and presentation experience ### Footer Last updated: December 2025
